field.label: Description
field.help: Short description to identify this realm and its target

field.label: Server
field.help: If not configured, the proxy will deny all Access-Requests for this realm.

field.label: Reply-Message
field.help: Specify a message to be sent back to the client if a Access-Request is denied because no server is configured.

field.label: Accounting-Server
field.help: If not configured, the proxy will silently ignore all Accounting-Requests for this realm.

field.label: Accounting-Response
field.help: Enable sending Accounting-Response instead of ignoring Accounting-Requests when no accoutingServer is configured.
